title: Love Island star India Reynolds shares bikini photo on Instagram
text:
She shot to fame by spending the summer in her swimwear on this year's Love Island.

And India Reynolds was back in her bikini on Monday for a sizzling Instagram video.

The reality show beauty, who is dating Love Island favourite Ovie Soko, wowed in a tiny white two-piece as she strutted for the camera.

Stunning: Love Island 2019 star India Reynolds was back in her bikini on Monday for a sizzling Instagram video

Pouting for the camera, India showed off best catwalk strut in the video, while flaunting her tanned curves in her white bikini.

After taking a spin, the gorgeous star, who sported minimal makeup, dissolved into giggles. 'Walking into a new week like...' she captioned the post.

The bikini body follows an impassioned post previously shared by India as she declared women should be confident with their bodies.

Work it: The reality show beauty, who is dating Love Island favourite Ovie Soko, wowed in a tiny white two-piece as she strutted for the camera

'You’re only getting 1 body! So you might as well learn to love it!!' she wrote alongside another stunning photo of herself in a bikini.

'It’s not always easy but we need to remember we all wobble & jiggle & have cellulite & things we’d like to change!!!'

'Being a model you can be so hard on yourself and clients can be harsh at castings & jobs and make you feel like you’re not good enough! I’ve left jobs in tears before!! But who are they to judge!?? Who is anyone??! I’m so grateful that all body shapes are now being more accepted in the industry!'

Message! The bikini body follows an impassioned post previously shared by India as she declared women should be confident with their bodies

India has been keeping busy with work since reaching the final of Love Island with Ovie in July, but as the couple have rarely been seen together in recent weeks rumours have surfaced that there's trouble for the pair.

It has been over a month since model India, 28, and basketball player Ovie, 28, were seen together - with the careers post-villa taking off, making it difficult for the couple to see one another.

A source exclusively told MailOnline: 'It's clear things aren't exactly rosy between them. They need time to meet up and work things out.'

Rocky: India has been keeping busy with work since reaching the final of Love Island with Ovie in July but in recent weeks rumours have surfaced that there's trouble for the pair

Fan favourites: Model India, 28, and basketball player Ovie, 28, reached the final three of Love Island 2019, but have rarely been seen together in the last few weeks

A second source told MailOnline: 'They have been trying to get together all week, but their busy work schedules haven't permitted it.'

A spokesperson for both India and Ovie confirmed to MailOnline that they are still together at present.

Fans of the couple took to Instagram on Thursday to question whether India was still with Ovie when she posted a snap of herself in skimpy lingerie, captioned 'waiting for bae.'

Rocky: A second source told MailOnline: 'They have been trying to get together all week, but their busy work schedules haven't permitted it' - the couple are still together (pictured August

Speculation: Fans of the couple took to Instagram on Thursday to question whether India was still with Ovie when she posted a snap of herself in skimpy lingerie, captioned 'waiting for bae.'

Wow! The reality star posted a playful caption that hinted she was waiting for her beau Ovie, after donning the lingerie for a photo shoot

The reality star looked incredible in a skimpy black bra and matching suspenders, with the posts complimenting her and inquiring about Ovie in equal measure.

In the snap, India ensured that every inch of her amazing figure could be seen, as she put on a sexy display in a revealing black bar and matching suspenders.

She captioned the post: 'Waiting for bae to get home like...' which appeared to be a reference to her boyfriend Ovie.

The post was quickly flooded with comments from fans demanding to know whether the 'bae' in questions was still Ovie. The couple have not been seen together since August.

One fan posted: 'Does she go out with Ovie still?' while another added: 'Are you and Ovie still together?'

A third wrote: 'Is Ovie still your bae?' while one fan also posted: 'Praying it's Ovie.'

A fan also asked: 'Are u still with over?'

Questions: Fans seemed to pick up on Ovie's recent absence and flooded the comments section with questions about whether they are still together

Ovie and India were last spotted together leaving the TV Choice Awards on 9th September, but neither have given any indication that they have split.

The couple finished third on Love Island in July, after striking up a romance just weeks before the series came to an end.

Last month Ovie was forced to hit back at claims that India had cheated on him with footballer Kieran Gibbs, 29, at his birthday party in Ibiza.

In an exclusive interview with MailOnline the basketball player said: 'Me and India are happy. I think that's definitely the most important thing. We're very happy.

'Regardless of how many people [there are] in every one of our lives, there will be opinions. And everyone can have their own opinion.'

The following India week also hit back at the cheating claims, telling MailOnline: 'We've had a week of nightmare things. There was one [rumour] last week and then yesterday there was another. Can we have a break? Can we just live, please?

'We've been absolutely fine, but obviously it's not nice. The worst thing is – something coming out in the paper is one thing, we know it's not true and we can just get over that – but it's all the people on Instagram that start sending you horrible messages.'

Clarifying the situation, she explained: ‘I’ve known Kieran and his brother for years and it was their 30th birthday so I was there with loads of friends and family. There’s nothing about it! It got blown into a ridiculous thing.’
